channel.title: String Position in another String?
channel.description:
I have a file with names in it and i want to find a specific name. Say the file has.
name1 name2 name3 name4
How can i return the position of name3?
Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 30, 2006, 03:04:05 AM[/size][hr]Nevermind, i'm an idiot.
strpos.
Close pls.
